entries: Holy magic fills your armaments, making them true weapons against evil. For 1 minute, your weapons and unarmed attacks gain the {@item holy} weapon rune while you hold them. If a weapon is at its limit on property runes, you can choose one property rune on the weapon to go dormant while the {@item holy} rune takes effect. In addition, any successful {@action strike||Strikes} your allies make while they're within 30 feet of you deal 1 additional good damage.
